title: A Passage to India
description: MOVIE TIE-IN. 1984 Harvset/HBJ trade paperback, {AA} printing. E. M. Forster (ASPECTS OF THE NOVEL). In a scathing indictment of British imperialism, Forster's once controversial novel portrays two Englishwomen who experience misunderstanding and cultural conflict after they travel to India. - Amazon
author: E.M. Forster
